> <OLD>
>
> Tucson lowers his sword but only a slight.
>
> " Rhinox...  If they can do that to him I'm pretty sure the same has been
> done to the Dinobots, and possibly to Primal and Cheetor.  This situation
> has become increasingly severe.  I'm sure Rodimus is on his way to being
> reformatted himself.   If only we had a way to copy Saberbacks intel, and
> transfer it back to Stanton, Bump and Legacy.  We could then try and trap
> our altered comrades and get them into stasis lock long enough to transport
> them out of here.  Big Convoy, how many sets of stasis cuffs do you and the
> others have on hand?  If we play our cards right, we might just be able to
> achieve more than one goal."

<NEW>

BIG CONVOY said nothing for a moment as he watched the guards continue
to prod RHINOX towards the door they had originally come out of.
SABERBACK's door stayed shut.

"Boyo we barely got the guns out." NIGHT VIPER said from his crouching
position. "Plus we weren't comin' for Maximals, we came to get
Magmatron."

CONVOY glanced back, "I have four pair." he said quietly.

"What was that?" LONGRACK said from his position next to TUSCON,
"Where did you get those?"

There was a small grunt from BIG CONVOY, "Let's just say I had hope
for Magmatron and a few on his team."

LONGRACK nodded, "But now what? I don't think we can walk in and just
ask Saberback for the information we need."

There was a grunt from STAMPY, "Maybe we can just go in there and
take!" He smacked a fist into an open hand.

CONVOY was about to respond when SABERBACK's door slid open and once
again he stepped, this time he was accompanied by another seeming
SHARKTICON, but this one, while looking identicle, seemed a bit
smarter or more aware.

They both began to walk towards the same door that the gaurds had used
while proding RHINOX.

"Now Skybyte, let us check on our newest prisoners." SABERBACK said.

There was a silent nod from SKYBYTE as he walked with SABERBACK up the hall.

BIG CONVOY frowned, "Perhaps we can take it after all. But whatever
we're going to do, we need to do it quickly." He looked back at
TUSCON, "I believe that Saberback was talking about checking on the
few sweeps that had brought in, and you Tuscon."

"Slag." SHARPEDGE said, "The steel is about to hit the furnace."

(TAG)

Preston
